html:
called thee. The Lord calls latter-day Israel to gather unto Zion and unto him (54:7). To put it another way, he calls the righteous to join him in the marriage.

woman forsaken/wife of youth…refused. Israel has been cast off because of her sins, as a wife might be forsaken or refused. But the rejection is temporary, "for a small moment," and then the Lord will bless Israel "with great mercies" (54:7; 50:1; Prov. 5:18; Mal. 2:14).

grieved in spirit. Like a wife forsaken, Israel grieves because of her separation from her Lord.
